document.full_text: jim crane, a houston businessman, reached a deal to acquire the astros from the owner drayton mclane for $680 million; the sale includes the lease on minute maid park.
document.title: houston businessman to buy astros
lines_and_colors: jim crane, a houston businessman, reached a deal to acquire the astros from the owner drayton mclane for $680 million; the sale includes the lease on minute maid park.
